title: Disk Scheduling Algorithms (Detailed)
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Refinements of SCAN.
- **LOOK**: Like SCAN/Elevator, but doesn't go to end of disk (0 or 100), reverses direction at last request.
- **C-LOOK**: Circular LOOK. Jumps back to start without servicing on return.
exam_notes: C-LOOK is usually the default choice.
